txt.en: 'We shall make haste. Are you ready?'

'I have been trying to connect the clues and pieces of the puzzle.

'Our culprit is not of this realm and is most likely making their escape... an escape witnessed by our poor victim. They are hastened by worry. They are making mistakes! 

'There is an old shipwreck to the south-west. I'd venture to guess that our culprit is going to try and make their escape by fashioning something sea-worthy out of that wreck. We must make haste. We approach under the guise of night.'
Solve the case of the Vile Trail
Hadorion has completed his investigation and needs your help to solve the case.
Hadorion wants your help preventing the culprit from making an escape by sea.
A Vile Trail Marked by Shadow
Hadorion wants to speak to you about further options pursuing Khâshap.\n\nHadorion can be found in his cabin in Barad Faen.

'I will need some time to consider our options [placeholder].

'Until then, I want you to seek passage across the seas. We now know that this Khâshap is prone to mistakes when pressured.

'I shall follow the trail to whatever ends. I will make contact with you when the time comes.

'I am grateful for your assistance here.'
